meanings.definition: A type of Mexican sandal made of woven leather or rubber.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new guarache for the beach.
meanings.sent2: She wore her favorite guarache to the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The guarache danced off her foot and into the sand.
meanings.sent4: His guarache left a trail of imprints in the mud.
meanings.sent5: The colorful guarache stood out among the other shoes.

meanings.definition: To hit or strike someone with a guarache.
meanings.sent1: He threatened to guarache the bully if he didn't stop.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally guarached her toe on the table leg.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat guarached the vase off the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The storm guarached the trees with strong winds.
meanings.sent5: The boxer guarached his opponent with a swift punch.

meanings.definition: A dish made with a fried tortilla topped with various ingredients.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious guarache at the Mexican restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She savored every bite of the flavorful guarache.
meanings.sent3: The giant guarache on the plate made her eyes widen.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the spicy guarache filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy texture of the guarache delighted her taste buds.
